name: The Hounds of Hell
description:
Each play is a single, randomly-generated maze.  You must find the gem and bring it back to the entrance while avoiding the Hounds of Hell.

Story

The Hounds of Hell came in the night and stole the town's protective gem.  You were chosen to enter their dungeon and retrieve it.

Find the gem and escape with your life.

Avoid the hounds if you can, their bite is fatal.

Your map will help you if you get lost.
